How You Can Help (Seriously)

Get Involved · Support · Share

Actions You Can Take

  • Adopt canopy-pool guidelines and share them with your hiking group.
  • Support trail associations that protect epiphytic mats.
  • Practice responsible curiosity: observe, don’t disturb.
